Workflow.Name: show/hide Building Control Lifecycle field, if change category = Major change. otherwise hide
Workflow.Description: If change category = Major change show Building Control Lifecycle field, otherwise its hidden by default (don't show for notifiable change)

Description.description: If change category = Major change show Building Control Lifecycle field, otherwise its hidden by default (don't show for notifiable change)
